description: Triangle T(n,k): write n in base 5, reverse order of digits.
links: Reinhard Zumkeller, Rows n = 0..1000 of triangle, flattened
prog: (PARI) A031235(n, k=-1)=/*k<0&&error("Flattened sequence not yet implemented.")*/n\5^k%5 \\ Assuming that columns are numbered starting with k=0 as in A030308, A030341, ... - M. F. Hasler, Jul 21 2013(Haskell)a031235 n k = a031235_tabf !! n !! ka031235_row n = a031235_tabf !! na031235_tabf = iterate succ [0] where   succ []     = [1]   succ (4:ts) = 0 : succ ts   succ (t:ts) = (t + 1) : ts-- _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Sep 18 2015
author: _Clark Kimberling_
extensions: Initial 0 and better name by _Philippe DelÃ©ham_, Oct 20 2011.
